text: Hawker Creek is a stream in Bollinger County in the U.S. state of Missouri. It was a tributary to the Castor River, but now flows into the Headwater Diversion Channel.Dongola, MO, and Advance, MO, 7.5 Minute Topographic Quadrangles, USGS, 1963 Hawker Creek thas the name of a pioneer who settled near it. ==See also== *List of rivers of Missouri ==References== Category:Rivers of Bollinger County, Missouri Category:Rivers of Missouri
title: Hawker Creek
